abstract.para: To get started with the Apache Tomcat on SLES AWS AMI, you only need to provision a new instance and deploy your application. The image reduces the manual effort and time required to set up Java/Tomcat environments.

section.title: Accessing the instance using SSH
section.para: To connect to your instance, use the ec2-user as the username and the SSH key you selected during instance creation.

section.title: Deploying applications
section.para: The image is configured to automatically start Apache Tomcat at boot. To deploy your web application, copy your WAR (Web Application Archive) files to the /srv/tomcat/webapps/ directory.
Tomcat log files are located in /var/log/tomcat/. Check these log files when troubleshooting and monitoring your application.
